description: Also known as the 「Divorce Deliberation Period」. Effective from January 1, 2021, this policy allows either spouse to withdraw a divorce application within 30 days of filing. It provides a period for couples to think calmly, addressing the issue of impulsive decisions made in the heat of the moment. This measure was introduced to counter the rising divorce rate in China since 2003.

examples.chinese: 2021年半年离婚率下降50%,离婚冷静期效果明显
examples.translation: The divorce rate dropped by 50% in the first half of 2021; the cooling-off period is clearly effective.

examples.chinese: 我处在离婚冷静期如何挽回婚姻
examples.translation: I am in the divorce cooling-off period; how can I save my marriage?

examples.chinese: 结婚容易离婚难,既然有离婚冷静期我支持创一个结婚冷静期
examples.translation: Marriage is easy but divorce is hard; since there is a divorce cooling-off period, I support creating a marriage cooling-off period.
